full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'DU SHES BCU GCIG BSTAN PA BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYI ZHAL 'CHEMS ZHES BYA BA'I MDO DANG, TSIGS SU BCAD PA BZHI BA ZHES BYA BA'I MDO RNAM GNYIS BZHUGS SO, ,
